short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clears download list of unnecessary items according to user preferences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will automatically clean your download list.

Automatically remove unnecessary download entries. Entries that no longer have the file on disk or are in a failed state can be removed.

Automatically remove completed download entries. This keeps your download list tidy and short.

Automatically delete files on disk. When a completed download is removed from the list, the file on the disk can be removed too. this stops unnecessary waste of disk space for downloads you no longer use.
